The sky coverage will be uploaded by others but it will be uploaded late because of this and you will see BBC from now on more frequently on every torrent site.

Don't pay any attention to the Seeders number. TPB spoofs that number during the initial stages of a torrent to make it more difficult for copyright owners to identify seeders.

The reason this torrent started out slowly is that the initial seeder, IAMH67, seeded slowly, perhaps to the limit of his Internet connection. Now some other seeders with Hannibal's source have joined in so things should speed up.

You guys are having a problem because this torrent currently has 6,000+ downloaders and only 400 something seeders. The file has already been seeded twice by me but too many people are downloading this race and it will take some time for all of them to get this. 

This is currently the 2nd most downloaded TV-Torrent on thepiratebay so just seed as best as you can when you are done even if it takes long to download. I myself also seed these for weeks.

Sorry if you get low speeds, it is down to luck who gets a connection with a seeder. If you sort the peers by "Peer DL" you will see that some people are getting 2 MBPS while others are getting just 100kbps. 

When thepiratebay Seeder and Leecher numbers will refresh in an hour there will be 1,000 - 2,000 seeds.
